TextBlock.Text: DARVY: Well ringdingding my rear, we've managed to crash TWICE in less than 3 months! What kind of sick luck is this?
BLUH: Dunno but- <color=red>*heavy wind sounds*</color> Ow, shidunes! Ah, my suit is tearing apart!
DARVY: What on Dyseria is this place? My suit fabric is- <color=red>*heavy clang*</color> Fudge! My helmet!
ARVI: We need to build shelter immediately!
BLUH: Yeah, no kidding! Wait, woah! Woah! <color=red>*hard impact on the floor*</color>
